title: Home-based agricultural producer of honey; inspections
context: [ยง328-80] Home-based agricultural producer of honey; inspections. If the department receives a consumer complaint about a home-based agricultural producer of honey, the producer shall be subject to food sampling and subsequent inspection of its premises to determine if the producer&rsquo;s products are misbranded or adulterated. [L 2005, c 63, pt of ยง1]
